reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, appreciating its thick, stretchy material and perfect length. They describe it as very flattering on the body, with one customer noting it hugs all the right places, and another mentioning it works well without a bra. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer highlighting its suitability for formal events and parties.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress â€“ Comfortable and Flattering!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! Itâ€™s stunning on and fits beautifully once you get the right size. I originally ordered a size too big, but the return process was super easy and hassle-free. The material is soft, stretchy, and very comfortable to wear. The deep V neck and high split give it a gorgeous, elegant look thatâ€™s perfect for formal events or parties. Definitely recommend â€” just make sure to double-check sizing! Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long length for short women

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress!
items.body: I got a small and it fit me perfectly. The cloth stretches. I usually wear a medium. Iâ€™m 5,3 Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Scam dress, nothing like the photo
items.body: Showed up NOTHING like advertised. The style doesn't match the sample photo, the fabric is a mix between cheap opaque fabrics and twisted mesh. The skirt is held together with elastic and the hem is nothing like the sample photo. It was for a big event, and it broke my heart to open this package. Read more
items.author: Aimee Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Love the material and the fit. Absolutely gorgeous! Super stretchy and lightweight. Read more
items.author: Autumn R

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Formal V Neck Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Formal V Neck Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Formal V Neck Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, Peacockblue, Pink, White, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
